name: Rare Stelton/Arne Jacobsen Cylinder Coffee Pot
description:
Arne Jacobsen designed his renowned range of hollowware - the Cylinda Line â€“ for Stelton in 1967. Since the very beginning, the range has been an undisputed icon of Scandinavian design. Today, this legendary range is part of numerous permanent collections at design museums all over the world. The Cylinda Line is known for its understated beauty and utter functionalism. Its design is based on different variations of cylindrical forms. Every piece gains its own characteristics through slight alterations in design. Although the Cylinda Line range is a collection, its pieces work very well alone or mixed with other tableware. The Cylinda Line includes pieces for complete tea and coffee set and all the essentials for your home bar. 

The Cylinda concept was originally sketched on a napkin in 1964, and it literally took three years to bring into production. It required and new technology to make Cylinda Line stainless-steel hollow-ware possible. Arne Jacobsen insisted on seamless tubes with perfect, brushed surfaces, and he continued to add new pieces to the collection until 1971. Jacobsen's insistence was awarded the 1967 ID Prize by the Danish Design Council, and pieces of the line are included in the permanent collections of the MOMA and the Victoria and Albert Museum. 

This piece is in very good condition for its age, it does have slight scuffing and a small scratch that is barely noticeble (see pictures) also a teeny chip out of the handle 

If you have any queries please dont hesitate to ask.

name: Vintage Bevelled Mirror
description:
Vintage bevelled mirror in good condition for age 

A few age spots consistant with a piece from this era 

22" x 13" rectangular in shape (hard to take a photo of a mirror) 

Sturdy fastenings-very heavy 

Please feel free to ask any questions

name: Retro/Vintage Orange Curver Cool Box
description:
Retro coolbox with nice sturdy handle,large enough to store milk upright-loads of room/family size 

Ideal for any camper or vw camper to finish off the vintage look. 

17" width 
15" tall 
10" depth 

A few marks consistant with a piece this age, inside its like new! 
There is age marks on the stainless steel of the handle, ive tried cleaning these off with stainless cleaner. 

If you have any questions please ask!

name: Vintage Tupperware 'Harvest' Collection
description:
6 pieces of the collectable fan series 'harvest' 

In used condition, signs of wear and discolouration consist with age.

2x 8.5" tall tupperware 
2x 7.5" tall tupperware (1 has a split on the lid) 
1 x 7" tall tupperware 
1x 6" tall tupperware 


Comes in the original tupperware plastic bag.

Please don't hesitate to ask any questions.

name: Starlite Horse
description:
Retro classic 1980s 'Starbrite' horse...companion of 80s girl crush/hero Starbrite 

Its in farely good condition...must remember this toy is 30 years old now! Eek I always wanted one when I was a kid...showing my age now! 

Most noticable are the hooves are farely worn and a little dirty but thats about it. 

The main is in good shape.
